posts.post_content:
For Sale: A very  nice t206 Cobb red background! PSA has graded this example a 1!

After the National and seeing a few Cobbs ranging from $800 and up, I feel that asking $500 is reasonable! 

Feel free to email me at [url]tlwise12@aol.com[/url] with any inquiries!


I'm also open to any serious offer with cash or trades (I have a HUGE wantlist available through email).

Thanks for looking!
Travis
